https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lTDCP7PSx4RV2vvTDAW2J950MtN.jpg 13-year-old Bartek tries desperately to hide the fact that his father beats him. Lonely and with no support from his mother or his school, tyrannized by his soccer coach, the boy finds his only friend in an old dying stray dog. A Man Thing
